title: ArtBin 0365500 Super Satchel Double Deep, Portable Art & Craft Organizer with Handle, [1] Plastic Storage Case, Clear with Gold Accents, Clear & Gold
description: ArtBin Super Satchel Compartment Box offers a perfect option for storing bulk art and craft supplies. The extra deep satchel box with one core compartment and 8 removal dividers provides maximum scope for customizing the space for storing and organizing the supplies. An art/craft enthusiast can store templates, paint tubes, craft sheets, ribbons, threads, documents, or photographs securely inside the polypropylene storage box. The satchel container for art-craft supplies has a flawless design with snap-tight latches. A smart handle makes it more relevant for folks who want portable art storage solutions.
